name: Zoo Crew: The Great Hike
description:
Zoo Crew is a Puzzle Game for Mini Jam 48 themed around teamwork.

You play as 3 animals who have to hike through a perilous mountain pass. Each animal can build one thing to help you along your way: Pig builds a ladder, moose a bridge and elephant a barricade to stop the lions from eating your team of intrepid explorers. 

Controls:

We didn't have time to add a tutorial, so here's the controls:

  • WASD or Arrow Keys to Move
  • Enter to Switch Characters  
  • Space to Build

Your aim is to reach the door at the end!

The game was made by Henry Delap-Smith (https://rabid-colonialist.itch.io/), Godmode6, Mister Hippo (https://soundcloud.com/creative-hippo)
